exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> R g : R -> V f' : R -> R g' : R -> V a, b : R l : V H : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> is_derive f t (f' t) H0 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> is_derive g t (g' t) H1 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> continuous f' t H2 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> continuous g' t H3 : is_RInt (fun t : R => scal (f t) (g' t)) a b l Unable to unify "is_RInt (fun t : R => scal (f t) (g' t)) a b (minus (minus (scal (f b) (g b)) (scal (f a) (g a))) l)" with "is_RInt (fun t : R => scal (f' t) (g t)) a b (minus (minus (scal (f b) (g b)) (scal (f a) (g a))) l)".
